notes: Delete or rename 'steam_api.dll' in order to use existing WarGaming account

title: World of Warships
notes: Just needed to set sound quality to low to get rid of slighly crackling audio.

Tested by playing a couple of matches against bots. Setting sound quality to low fixes all the stuttering. I ran medium settings preset with fxaa set to high and it is 60+ fps most of the time. It dips below when accessing menus but that also happens on Windows so it's pretty normal.
